divs: Sighting Detailsdrove out the back door of the plant where i work to empty a dumpster and noticed a pulsating light coming from the south headed in a northern direction.object was traveling at a high rate of speed.it came directly over the top of me no sound whatever.looked to be about 1000 to 1500 feet above and the size of an asprin.sighting lasted around 7 seconds.was not an airplane helicopter or jet,there was no sound at all.this is the second time i have seen this object.the only lights were the object itself which pulsated.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Benson
There were no other sightings in Benson on or around November 11th 2012
